title: MY NEW MUSIC SETUP
description: My new music channel -   STUFF IN THIS VIDEO LINKED BELOW  Desk by UpDesk -   Sennheiser RS 185 RF Wireless Headphones   Shure SRH440 Professional Studio Headphones   Roli Seaboard Rise   Shure BETA 58A Supercardioid Dynamic Microphone   Boss RC-505 Loop Station   Mackie 402VLZ4, 4-channel Ultra Compact Mixer   Universal Audio Apollo Twin Interface   Yamaha HS8 W 8-Inch Powered Studio Monitors (SPEAKERS)   Atomos Shogun 4K Recorder   Native Instruments Komplete Kontrol S49 Keyboard   Wireless Outlet Remote   Shure SM7B Vocal Dynamic Microphone   FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
